elementalSpark:SparkStarterRelic.NAME: Unbridled Sprite
DESCRIPTIONS: Enter a random element at the start of the fight

elementalSpark:UntamedFire.NAME: Untamed Fire
DESCRIPTIONS: No longer loose strength when exiting Fire. But Gain one elementalspark:Burned each time you enter it

elementalSpark:EverfullUrn.NAME: Everfull Urn
DESCRIPTIONS: Before your turn start enter the elementalspark:Water stace

elementalSpark:MagicRock.NAME: Magic Rock
DESCRIPTIONS: When you enter the elementalspark:Earth gain 3 block

elementalSpark:FeatherArmor.NAME: Feather Armor
DESCRIPTIONS: When you get unblocked hits you have a 50% chance to enter elementalspark:Air
